attributes.action: Make Wootton Bassett a royal town to be known as Royal Wootton Basset
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We would like to recognise and honour the town of Wootton Bassett in thanks for its suppport of the families of our armed forces.  They have shown great support and compassion for the mouring families of so many of our loved ones.  This would show the country's thanks for such tragic loss.  Please make this part of the Queens New Year Honours. In this sad times with so much bad publicity for this war to bring some good by doing something so simple.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
